CustomField.description: AD-130 - field to calculate the number of days from the current due date if the action is not completed
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed'), IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Due_Date__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Close_Date__c)), Close_Date__c > Due_Date__c ), Close_Date__c - Due_Date__c, null ), IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Due_Date__c)), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'In Progress'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Overdue') ), TODAY() > Due_Date__c ), TODAY() - Due_Date__c, null ) )
CustomField.label: Days Action is Overdue
